Original: Ah, did the gold-foil writing on that
request catch your interest? It's from
the Golden Lady, a very elegant woman.
[Page]
She seems to want the fur from a
bright, golden monster known as a
[Color:5][Enemy1:102][Color:0].
[Page]
The monster resides in the [Color:5]Golden Deer
Keep[Color:0], where her soldiers have already
been sent.
[Page]
You are to work with them to capture
it. For more details, I believe you
should consult the soldiers.
Translation: Ah, did the gold-foil writing on that
request catch your interest? It's from
the Golden Lady, a very elegant woman.
[Page]
She seems to want the fur from a
bright, golden monster known as a
[Color:5][Enemy1:102][Color:0].
[Page]
The monster resides in the [Color:5]Golden Deer
Keep[Color:0], where her soldiers have already
been sent.
[Page]
You are to work with them to capture
it. For more details, I believe you
should consult the soldiers.

Original: Welcome back. As difficult as this
request seemed, I think you did an
excellent job with it.
[Page]
What an absurd request... to capture
a dangerous creature of the labyrinth
alive...!
[Page]
Regardless, I am glad that you are
safe. You may not get the promised
bonus, but you do have your lives.
Translation: Welcome back. As difficult as this
request seemed, I think you did an
excellent job with it.
[Page]
What an absurd request... to capture
a dangerous creature of the labyrinth
alive...!
[Page]
Regardless, I am glad that you are
safe. You may not get the promised
bonus, but you do have your lives.

Original: I heard from the Golden Lady that your
[Guild] Guild succeeded in capturing
the [Enemy1:102]!
[Page]
Was predicting the monster's movements
too simple a task for you veteran
explorers?
[Page]
Alas... in the end, that beautiful fur
will be turned into a coat for the
Lady. My feelings are somewhat mixed.
[Page]
Though you seem to accept it with
aplomb. So long as you get your
reward, I suppose.
[Page]
Here is the reward you were promised.
Thank you for your excellent work,
and please do come again!
Translation: I heard from the Golden Lady that your
[Guild] Guild succeeded in capturing
the [Enemy1:102]!
[Page]
Was predicting the monster's movements
too simple a task for you veteran
explorers?
[Page]
Alas... in the end, that beautiful fur
will be turned into a coat for the
Lady. My feelings are somewhat mixed.
[Page]
Though you seem to accept it with
aplomb. So long as you get your
reward, I suppose.
[Page]
Here is the reward you were promised.
Thank you for your excellent work,
and please do come again!

Original: You arrive at the labyrinth after
agreeing to capture the [Enemy1:102].
Several soldiers greet you.
Translation: You arrive at the labyrinth after
agreeing to capture the [Enemy1:102].
Several soldiers greet you.

Original: "Are you guys the [Guild] Guild?
Our Lady said you took the request.
[Page]
"Let's get down to brass tacks. Or
gold tacks," grins the soldier as he
slowly raises his hand.
[Page]
At his signal, soldiers on either side
of the path pull on a rope and a giant
cage rises from under the ground!
[Page]
"Get a load of this beauty! We had
this specially built to capture that
thing without damaging the fur.
[Page]
"You guys [Color:5]go into its room and lead it
over here[Color:0]. You can handle that, right?
From all I've heard..."
[Page]
Before you can nod, the soldier
yells, "Get to your places!" to his
associates, and they go into hiding.
Translation: "Are you guys the [Guild] Guild?
Our Lady said you took the request.
[Page]
"Let's get down to brass tacks. Or
gold tacks," grins the soldier as he
slowly raises his hand.
[Page]
At his signal, soldiers on either side
of the path pull on a rope and a giant
cage rises from under the ground!
[Page]
"Get a load of this beauty! We had
this specially built to capture that
thing without damaging the fur.
[Page]
"You guys [Color:5]go into its room and lead it
over here[Color:0]. You can handle that, right?
From all I've heard..."
[Page]
Before you can nod, the soldier
yells, "Get to your places!" to his
associates, and they go into hiding.

Original: You prepare for your own part in
capturing the [Enemy1:102].
Translation: You prepare for your own part in
capturing the [Enemy1:102].

Original: "We'll be waiting by the trap,
so hurry and lure the [Enemy1:102]
this way."
Translation: "We'll be waiting by the trap,
so hurry and lure the [Enemy1:102]
this way."

Original: The Golden Deer notices you and wastes
no time in charging!
[Page]
You must carefully avoid the monster
and lure it to where the soldiers
await with the trap!
Translation: The Golden Deer notices you and wastes
no time in charging!
[Page]
You must carefully avoid the monster
and lure it to where the soldiers
await with the trap!

Original: When you open the door, the sight of
a beautiful, golden deer with shining
fur greets you.
[Page]
It can only be the [Enemy1:102] you
seek to capture! You must skillfully
lure it to the waiting trap!
Translation: When you open the door, the sight of
a beautiful, golden deer with shining
fur greets you.
[Page]
It can only be the [Enemy1:102] you
seek to capture! You must skillfully
lure it to the waiting trap!

Original: As you put away your weapons after the
monster's defeat, the soldiers come
around and cry out in disappointment.
Translation: As you put away your weapons after the
monster's defeat, the soldiers come
around and cry out in disappointment.

Original: "How did this happen!?
The [Enemy1:102]'s fur has
been damaged...
[Page]
"But I guess we can't complain if the
monster was just that powerful.
[Page]
"Still... there's no way the Lady
will accept the fur in this state.
[Page]
"It's a shame we didn't get to test
out that cage, either... Oh well.
Thanks for helping anyway, guys.
[Page]
"Take it away!" the soldier calls,
and his associates gather around the
monster to remove its remains.
Translation: "How did this happen!?
The [Enemy1:102]'s fur has
been damaged...
[Page]
"But I guess we can't complain if the
monster was just that powerful.
[Page]
"Still... there's no way the Lady
will accept the fur in this state.
[Page]
"It's a shame we didn't get to test
out that cage, either... Oh well.
Thanks for helping anyway, guys.
[Page]
"Take it away!" the soldier calls,
and his associates gather around the
monster to remove its remains.

Original: Though you did not meet the original
objective, the request is complete.
You need only report in to the bar.
Translation: Though you did not meet the original
objective, the request is complete.
You need only report in to the bar.

Original: Now that the battle is over, you can
no longer see the [Enemy1:102].
[Page]
In order to fulfill the request, your
only option is to wait for the monster
to show itself again...
Translation: Now that the battle is over, you can
no longer see the [Enemy1:102].
[Page]
In order to fulfill the request, your
only option is to wait for the monster
to show itself again...

Original: After desperately fleeing from the
charging monster, you feel its menace
dissipate and finally halt.
[Page]
The sense of danger has been replaced
by the hearty cheers of the soldiers!
Translation: After desperately fleeing from the
charging monster, you feel its menace
dissipate and finally halt.
[Page]
The sense of danger has been replaced
by the hearty cheers of the soldiers!

Original: After you catch your breath, you walk
up to the cage and see a golden-furred
monster thrashing about inside.
Translation: After you catch your breath, you walk
up to the cage and see a golden-furred
monster thrashing about inside.

Original: "That went pretty well! Thanks to your
courage, your quick wits, and... this
beauty of a cage!
[Page]
"Our Lady will be pleased as punch!
Thanks, [Guild] Guild!
[Page]
"That's all we needed from you.
The reward is at the bar, and if
you ask me, you guys deserve it."
[Page]
You nod to the soldier, who yells,
"Take it away!" His associates heft
the cage as one and walk off.
Translation: "That went pretty well! Thanks to your
courage, your quick wits, and... this
beauty of a cage!
[Page]
"Our Lady will be pleased as punch!
Thanks, [Guild] Guild!
[Page]
"That's all we needed from you.
The reward is at the bar, and if
you ask me, you guys deserve it."
[Page]
You nod to the soldier, who yells,
"Take it away!" His associates heft
the cage as one and walk off.

Original: After the soldiers carrying the cage
have vanished from view, you return
to Tharsis to report your success.
Translation: After the soldiers carrying the cage
have vanished from view, you return
to Tharsis to report your success.

Original: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Golden Deer Keep[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Golden Deer Keep[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
